tool_description: Validates user existence and status across specified systems before role operations.

user_identifier.description: User ID, email, or username to validate

validation_type.description: Type of validation: existence, active, suspended, locked

error_messages: Invalid user identifier: Provide a non-empty user identifier string.
System not accessible: The specified system cannot be reached or authenticated.
Invalid validation type: Use one of [existence, active, suspended, locked].
User lookup failed: User identifier not found in the specified system.
usage: Provide user_identifier and system_name to validate user existence. Optionally specify validation_type for detailed status checks.

user_exists.description: Whether the user exists in the system

user_status.description: Current status of the user account
